{"rule":"ENGLISH_WORD_REPEAT_RULE","sentence":"^\\QAdvantages and limitations (sometimes) of parametric statistics: Standard, widely used Computationally efficient/simple Analytically proven Based on assumptions Assumptions can be hard to test Violations can be inscrutable Advantages and limitations (sometimes) of nonparametric statistics: “No” assumptions necessary Appropriate for non-numeric data Appropriate for small sample sizes Can be “block box” algorithms Can be inefficient/slow Results can vary each run In general, use parametric methods when possible and nonparametric methods when necessary.\\E$"}
